If someone asked....let's go anywhere in the world, I would say, take me to Toronto!  The last time I was there,  I was working as a nanny and traveling with the family.  We stayed in the Weston Hotel on the harbor.  I got lots of time off so I ate a hot dog from a street vendor and explored all the shops along the harbor district.  The Inuit museum was amazing!  It was June and there was a week long street festival going on with performances of all types all along the harbor.    Toronto is my dream big city and I am a small town gal.
